response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $1,200,000 to us, reflecting its unique features, high-quality materials, and the extensive research and development that went into its creation. Given its immense value and the exclusivity it offers, we are offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $1,100,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for unparalleled quality. We believe this price presents an excellent opportunity for you to secure a piece that not only adds significant value to your collection but also aligns with your financial considerations. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of a seamless transaction process and dedicated support throughout your experience with our product. We look forward to the possibility of welcoming you as a distinguished owner of this extraordinary item.", "product_price": 1100000}
